content: 昨晚又熬夜写代码，今天困到不行。Why is coding so addictive? I just can’t stop once I start, even if I know I’ll regret it tomorrow morning.
终于搞懂了Vue的响应式原理，感动哭了😭 Now I can finally explain reactivity to my friends, but they still think I’m weird.
Leetcode 刷到第200题，头发还在。Sometimes I wonder if algorithms will ever help me in real life, but at least my resume looks cool.
今天摸鱼被老板发现了，差点社死。Pretending to be busy is an art, but my acting skills need improvement.
Coding with sunlight feels different, maybe I’ll have fewer bugs today. The weather is perfect for some productive hours at the desk.
Refactoring old code feels like spring cleaning. 代码也要断舍离，写得越多越觉得简洁才是美。
凌晨三点debug，bug和我都不睡。Sometimes the best solutions come when everyone else is asleep.
新项目上线啦！All-nighter paid off. Launching a project is like sending your kid to school for the first time.
拖延症晚期，ddl前一晚才开始写。Procrastination is my superpower, but the stress is real.
Is this passion or addiction? Maybe both. I just spent my whole weekend building a side project and I loved every minute.
Sleep is important, but so is finishing this feature. Why do deadlines always come so fast?
Automation is the future, and I’m just getting started. My new script saves me 30 minutes every day!
Pulled another all-nighter to fix a production bug. Coffee is my best friend now.
The drama never ends on tech Twitter. Sometimes I learn more from the comments than the original post.
StackOverflow 是我的第二大脑。Copy, paste, pray, repeat.
console.log 一切，debug无敌。If in doubt, just print it out.
今天终于学会了正则表达式！Regex is like magic, but sometimes it feels like black magic.
阳光正好，适合写点代码。Coding with sunlight feels different, maybe I’ll have fewer bugs today.
买了新键盘，钱包又瘦了。Mechanical keyboards are my weakness, but they make coding so much more fun.
一天不写代码浑身难受。Is this passion or addiction? Maybe both.
